name: Morgandra
desc: Morgandra is often revered as the goddess of all things good.
She protects the weak, and her followers uphold a set of strict virtues.
Morgandra is often followed by Aasimar and Humands.

name: Beldmos
desc: The god of creation, the morning, and the sun.
Beldmos is revered as a skilled smith and has a great following of Dwarves.

name: Helenis
desc: A goddess of death, decay, and the night. Some would think Helenis to be an evil deity.
The Elves understand that these things are but a natural part of the world, and all thing must pass eventually.

name: Lenagos
desc: Initially a powerful spirit, Lenagos is now the god of order and law to fill the void left by Hotan.
Many humans of the greater cities are followers of Lenagos as they believe his ideals to be the strong fundations for a successful society.

name: Banden
desc: A nature spirit turned god, Banden represents all things wild and fey.
Revered by druids of all races as well as the Centaurs, Firbolgs, and even some Elves.

name: Veia
desc: Veia gifted mortals with the boon of magic, allowing them to experience the wonders of the arcane.
Wizards and sorcerers alike now look to Veia for guidance, though her intentions are not always for the greater good.

name: Stratuul
desc: Stratuul, god of strength and war, was once one of the most powerful gods on Mediterra until the Pantheon of Iteria banished him and Hotan to Sotoris.
Stratuul was once worshiped by the Hobgoblins, Minotaurs, and Orcs until the Great War ended.

name: Ulshelak
desc: Ulshelak, god of madness, was born from the Churning Chaos at the edge of reality. Though not directly involved in the Second War,...eriq never finished this desc. WAY TO GO ERIQ

name: Hotan
desc: The Great War started when Hotan sought to betray his siblings, the Pantheon of Iteria, and seized control of Mediterra after forsaking his duties as a god of order.
Now Hotan sits trapped within the burning realm of Sotoris, clawing at his confinements while those few who still follow him await his return.

name: Lothien, the Fox
desc: ERIQ ADD ONE

name: Kuro, the Owl
desc: ERIQ ADD ONE

name: Actaeon, the Stag
desc: ERIQ ADD ONE

name: Misha, the Bear
boon: You gain a +1 to disappointment rolls, enemies now shout 'MISSHAAAAA NOOOOOO!'
desc: You were hoping for a 4,2 with charge, but sadly, you low rolled and had to settle for a bear.

name: Kolodian the Huntmaster
desc: Summon a 1,1 doggo with charge for each enemy
